mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, phone_number, password, sex, blood_type, birthday, height, weight, contact, contact_phone

create_time,
update_time,
phone_number,

mapper.update:
update user
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=CHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
blood_type = #{bloodType,jdbcType=CHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
height = #{height,jdbcType=TINYINT},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=TINYINT},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, blood_type = #{bloodType,jdbcType=CHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, height = #{height,jdbcType=TINYINT}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=TINYINT}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
